DOC.brief_summary: Recent evidence small study show potential benefit acupuncture treatment obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) . These study evaluate benefit treatment cardiovascular system . Primary end-point : To investigate effect acupuncture improve OSA severity among hypertensive patient . Secondary end-point To investigate effect acupuncture improve quality life sleep assess Short Form 36 ( SF-36 ) questionnaire Pittsburgh Questionaire ( PSQI ) ; To investigate effect acupuncture blood pressure arterial stiffness
DOC.brief_title: The Role Acupuncture Treatment Obstructive Sleep Apnea Patients With Hypertension
DOC.criteria: 5 < apneahypopnea index ( AHI ) < 30 e/h body mass index > 35 kg/m2 Previous OSA treatment
